abstract: VidMe is a new site for privately sharing videos with a select group of people.
snippet: VidMe is a new site for privately sharing videos with a select group of people.
lead_paragraph: Some people post videos to YouTube and Facebook with the hope that they will go viral. But for many others, the idea of the whole world viewing a personal video is a nightmare.

headline.main: A Site for the Videos You Don’t Want Everyone to See
